send(String) - Method in class clueNetwork.ClientSocket
Method sends the bytes corresponding to the given message on the socket.
serialize() - Method in class clueServer.GameBoard
Public Method: serialize
Purpose: takes the information from GameBoard, Piece, and Room to make an array that describes the board via a series of colors to represent each bit of information about a cell

Precondition: board must have been changed
Postcondition: model is created and returned for display
Parameters: none
Server - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
The Server class represents the top of the server-side class hierarchy.
Server() - Constructor for class clueServer.Server
Default constructor override.
server - Variable in class clueServer.Users
back-reference to Server object
serverAddr - Variable in class clueClient.Client
the hostname / ip string of the server process for this Clue game
ServerListener - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
Class that describes a server listener.
ServerListener(Users) - Constructor for class clueServer.ServerListener
Constructor that creates a serverListener
Purpose: default constructor
Takes 1 arguments, applies the default port static property from the Utilities class
ServerListener(Users, int) - Constructor for class clueServer.ServerListener
Purpose: Constructor that creates a serverListener
What it does:

First: assign the given port to the internal port representation
Second: create a new Server listening socket on the specified port
Third: start listening for player connections
serverListenerTimeoutMillis - Static variable in class utils.Utilities
This is the value--in milliseconds--that the ServerListener will listen with it's accept method before raising a SocketTimeoutException event
60 seconds in a minute, 1000 milliseconds in a second, 5 minutes
serverSock - Variable in class clueServer.ServerListener
stores an instance of the listening socket
setComputerPlayer() - Method in class clueServer.Player
Purpose: designate this Player as no longer having a connected ClientSocket

Precondition: player exists
Postcondition: none
setFileOutput(String) - Static method in class utils.Utilities
Purpose: Utility function for opening a FileOutputStream on a File
Preconditions: None
Postconditions: There is a File object ready to be written
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- TRY to open a FileOutputStream on the File with the name parameter
- - package the FileOutputStream into a PrintStream
- CATCH FileNotFoundException and just return the console PrintStream
END
